29#include <sys/cdefs.h>
30__KERNEL_RCSID(0, "$NetBSD: nouveau_fence.c,v 1.14 2019/04/16 10:00:04 mrg Exp $");
31
32#include <drm/drmP.h>
33
34#include <asm/param.h>
35#include <linux/ktime.h>
36#include <linux/hrtimer.h>
37#include <trace/events/fence.h>
38
39#include <nvif/notify.h>
40#include <nvif/event.h>
41
42#include "nouveau_drm.h"
43#include "nouveau_dma.h"
44#include "nouveau_fence.h"
45
46static const struct fence_ops nouveau_fence_ops_uevent;
47static const struct fence_ops nouveau_fence_ops_legacy;
48
49static inline struct nouveau_fence *
50from_fence(struct fence *fence)
51{
52 return container_of(fence, struct nouveau_fence, base);
53}
54
55static inline struct nouveau_fence_chan *
56nouveau_fctx(struct nouveau_fence *fence)
57{
58 return container_of(fence->base.lock, struct nouveau_fence_chan, lock);
59}
60
61static int
62nouveau_fence_signal(struct nouveau_fence *fence)
63{
64 int drop = 0;
65
66 fence_signal_locked(&fence->base);
67 list_del(&fence->head);
68 rcu_assign_pointer(fence->channel, NULL);
69
70 if (test_bit(FENCE_FLAG_USER_BITS, &fence->base.flags)) {
71 struct nouveau_fence_chan *fctx = nouveau_fctx(fence);
72
73 if (!--fctx->notify_ref)
74 drop = 1;
75 }
76
77 fence_put(&fence->base);
78 return drop;
79}
80
81static struct nouveau_fence *
82nouveau_local_fence(struct fence *fence, struct nouveau_drm *drm) {
83 struct nouveau_fence_priv *priv = (void*)drm->fence;
84
85 if (fence->ops != &nouveau_fence_ops_legacy &&
86 fence->ops != &nouveau_fence_ops_uevent)
87 return NULL;
88
89 if (fence->context < priv->context_base ||
90 fence->context >= priv->context_base + priv->contexts)
91 return NULL;
92
93 return from_fence(fence);
94}
95
96void
97nouveau_fence_context_del(struct nouveau_fence_chan *fctx)
98{
99 struct nouveau_fence *fence;
100
101 spin_lock_irq(&fctx->lock);
102 while (!list_empty(&fctx->pending)) {
103 fence = list_entry(fctx->pending.next, typeof(*fence), head);
104
105 if (nouveau_fence_signal(fence))
106 nvif_notify_put(&fctx->notify);
107 }
108 spin_unlock_irq(&fctx->lock);
109
110 nvif_notify_fini(&fctx->notify);
111 fctx->dead = 1;
112
113 /*
114 * Ensure that all accesses to fence->channel complete before freeing
115 * the channel.
116 */
117 synchronize_rcu();
118}
119
120static void
121nouveau_fence_context_put(struct kref *fence_ref)
122{
123 struct nouveau_fence_chan *fctx =
124 container_of(fence_ref, struct nouveau_fence_chan, fence_ref);
125
126 spin_lock_destroy(&fctx->lock);
127 kfree(fctx);
128}
129
130void
131nouveau_fence_context_free(struct nouveau_fence_chan *fctx)
132{
133 kref_put(&fctx->fence_ref, nouveau_fence_context_put);
134}
135
136static int
137nouveau_fence_update(struct nouveau_channel *chan, struct nouveau_fence_chan *fctx)
138{
139 struct nouveau_fence *fence;
140 int drop = 0;
141 u32 seq = fctx->read(chan);
142
143 while (!list_empty(&fctx->pending)) {
144 fence = list_entry(fctx->pending.next, typeof(*fence), head);
145
146 if ((int)(seq - fence->base.seqno) < 0)
147 break;
148
149 drop |= nouveau_fence_signal(fence);
150 }
151
152 return drop;
153}
154
155static int
156nouveau_fence_wait_uevent_handler(struct nvif_notify *notify)
157{
158 struct nouveau_fence_chan *fctx =
159 container_of(notify, typeof(*fctx), notify);
160 unsigned long flags;
161 int ret = NVIF_NOTIFY_KEEP;
162
163 spin_lock_irqsave(&fctx->lock, flags);
164 if (!list_empty(&fctx->pending)) {
165 struct nouveau_fence *fence;
166 struct nouveau_channel *chan;
167
168 fence = list_entry(fctx->pending.next, typeof(*fence), head);
169 chan = rcu_dereference_protected(fence->channel, lockdep_is_held(&fctx->lock));
170 if (nouveau_fence_update(chan, fctx))
171 ret = NVIF_NOTIFY_DROP;
172 }
173 spin_unlock_irqrestore(&fctx->lock, flags);
174
175 return ret;
176}
177
178void
179nouveau_fence_context_new(struct nouveau_channel *chan, struct nouveau_fence_chan *fctx)
180{
181 struct nouveau_fence_priv *priv = (void*)chan->drm->fence;
182 struct nouveau_cli *cli = (void *)chan->user.client;
183 int ret;
184
185 INIT_LIST_HEAD(&fctx->flip);
186 INIT_LIST_HEAD(&fctx->pending);
187 spin_lock_init(&fctx->lock);
188 fctx->context = priv->context_base + chan->chid;
189
190 if (chan == chan->drm->cechan)
191 strcpy(fctx->name, "copy engine channel");
192 else if (chan == chan->drm->channel)
193 strcpy(fctx->name, "generic kernel channel");
194 else
195 strcpy(fctx->name, nvxx_client(&cli->base)->name);
196
197 kref_init(&fctx->fence_ref);
198 if (!priv->uevent)
199 return;
200
201 ret = nvif_notify_init(&chan->user, nouveau_fence_wait_uevent_handler,
202 false, G82_CHANNEL_DMA_V0_NTFY_UEVENT,
203 &(struct nvif_notify_uevent_req) { },
204 sizeof(struct nvif_notify_uevent_req),
205 sizeof(struct nvif_notify_uevent_rep),
206 &fctx->notify);
207
208 WARN_ON(ret);
209}
210
211struct nouveau_fence_work {
212 struct work_struct work;
213 struct fence_cb cb;
214 void (*func)(void *);
215 void *data;
216};
217
218static void
219nouveau_fence_work_handler(struct work_struct *kwork)
220{
221 struct nouveau_fence_work *work = container_of(kwork, typeof(*work), work);
222 work->func(work->data);
223 kfree(work);
224}
225
226static void nouveau_fence_work_cb(struct fence *fence, struct fence_cb *cb)
227{
228 struct nouveau_fence_work *work = container_of(cb, typeof(*work), cb);
229
230 schedule_work(&work->work);
231}
232
233void
234nouveau_fence_work(struct fence *fence,
235 void (*func)(void *), void *data)
236{
237 struct nouveau_fence_work *work;
238
239 if (fence_is_signaled(fence))
240 goto err;
241
242 work = kmalloc(sizeof(*work), GFP_KERNEL);
243 if (!work) {
244 /*
245 * this might not be a nouveau fence any more,
246 * so force a lazy wait here
247 */
248 WARN_ON(nouveau_fence_wait((struct nouveau_fence *)fence,
249 true, false));
250 goto err;
251 }
252
253 INIT_WORK(&work->work, nouveau_fence_work_handler);
254 work->func = func;
255 work->data = data;
256
257 if (fence_add_callback(fence, &work->cb, nouveau_fence_work_cb) < 0)
258 goto err_free;
259 return;
260
261err_free:
262 kfree(work);
263err:
264 func(data);
265}
266
267int
268nouveau_fence_emit(struct nouveau_fence *fence, struct nouveau_channel *chan)
269{
270 struct nouveau_fence_chan *fctx = chan->fence;
271 struct nouveau_fence_priv *priv = (void*)chan->drm->fence;
272 int ret;
273
274 fence->channel = chan;
275 fence->timeout = jiffies + (15 * HZ);
276
277 if (priv->uevent)
278 fence_init(&fence->base, &nouveau_fence_ops_uevent,
279 &fctx->lock, fctx->context, ++fctx->sequence);
280 else
281 fence_init(&fence->base, &nouveau_fence_ops_legacy,
282 &fctx->lock, fctx->context, ++fctx->sequence);
283 kref_get(&fctx->fence_ref);
284
285 trace_fence_emit(&fence->base);
286 ret = fctx->emit(fence);
287 if (!ret) {
288 fence_get(&fence->base);
289 spin_lock_irq(&fctx->lock);
290
291 if (nouveau_fence_update(chan, fctx))
292 nvif_notify_put(&fctx->notify);
293
294 list_add_tail(&fence->head, &fctx->pending);
295 spin_unlock_irq(&fctx->lock);
296 }
297
298 return ret;
299}
300
301bool
302nouveau_fence_done(struct nouveau_fence *fence)
303{
304 if (fence->base.ops == &nouveau_fence_ops_legacy ||
305 fence->base.ops == &nouveau_fence_ops_uevent) {
306 struct nouveau_fence_chan *fctx = nouveau_fctx(fence);
307 struct nouveau_channel *chan;
308 unsigned long flags;
309
310 if (test_bit(FENCE_FLAG_SIGNALED_BIT, &fence->base.flags))
311 return true;
312
313 spin_lock_irqsave(&fctx->lock, flags);
314 chan = rcu_dereference_protected(fence->channel, lockdep_is_held(&fctx->lock));
315 if (chan && nouveau_fence_update(chan, fctx))
316 nvif_notify_put(&fctx->notify);
317 spin_unlock_irqrestore(&fctx->lock, flags);
318 }
319 return fence_is_signaled(&fence->base);
320}
321
322static long
323nouveau_fence_wait_legacy(struct fence *f, bool intr, long wait)
324{
325 struct nouveau_fence *fence = from_fence(f);
326#ifndef __NetBSD__
327 unsigned long sleep_time = NSEC_PER_MSEC / 1000;
328#endif
329 unsigned long t = jiffies, timeout = t + wait;
330
331#ifdef __NetBSD__
332 while (!nouveau_fence_done(fence)) {
333 int ret;
334 /* XXX what lock? */
335 /* XXX errno NetBSD->Linux */
336 ret = -kpause("nvfencel", intr, 1, NULL);
337 if (ret) {
338 if (ret == -ERESTART)
339 ret = -ERESTARTSYS;
340 return ret;
341 }
342 t = jiffies;
343 if (t >= timeout)
344 return 0;
345 }
346#else
347 while (!nouveau_fence_done(fence)) {
348 ktime_t kt;
349
350 t = jiffies;
351
352 if (wait != MAX_SCHEDULE_TIMEOUT && time_after_eq(t, timeout)) {
353 __set_current_state(TASK_RUNNING);
354 return 0;
355 }
356
357 __set_current_state(intr ? TASK_INTERRUPTIBLE :
358 TASK_UNINTERRUPTIBLE);
359
360 kt = ktime_set(0, sleep_time);
361 schedule_hrtimeout(&kt, HRTIMER_MODE_REL);
362 sleep_time *= 2;
363 if (sleep_time > NSEC_PER_MSEC)
364 sleep_time = NSEC_PER_MSEC;
365
366 if (intr && signal_pending(current))
367 return -ERESTARTSYS;
368 }
369
370 __set_current_state(TASK_RUNNING);
371#endif
372
373 return timeout - t;
374}
375
376static int
377nouveau_fence_wait_busy(struct nouveau_fence *fence, bool intr)
378{
379 int ret = 0;
380
381 while (!nouveau_fence_done(fence)) {
382 if (time_after_eq(jiffies, fence->timeout)) {
383 ret = -EBUSY;
384 break;
385 }
386
387#ifdef __NetBSD__
388 /* XXX unlock anything? */
389 /* XXX poll for interrupts? */
390 DELAY(1000);
391#else
392 __set_current_state(intr ?
393 TASK_INTERRUPTIBLE :
394 TASK_UNINTERRUPTIBLE);
395
396 if (intr && signal_pending(current)) {
397 ret = -ERESTARTSYS;
398 break;
399 }
400#endif
401 }
402
403#ifndef __NetBSD__
404 __set_current_state(TASK_RUNNING);
405#endif
406 return ret;
407}
408
409int
410nouveau_fence_wait(struct nouveau_fence *fence, bool lazy, bool intr)
411{
412 long ret;
413
414 if (!lazy)
415 return nouveau_fence_wait_busy(fence, intr);
416
417 ret = fence_wait_timeout(&fence->base, intr, 15 * HZ);
418 if (ret < 0)
419 return ret;
420 else if (!ret)
421 return -EBUSY;
422 else
423 return 0;
424}
425
426int
427nouveau_fence_sync(struct nouveau_bo *nvbo, struct nouveau_channel *chan, bool exclusive, bool intr)
428{
429 struct nouveau_fence_chan *fctx = chan->fence;
430 struct fence *fence;
431 struct reservation_object *resv = nvbo->bo.resv;
432 struct reservation_object_list *fobj;
433 struct nouveau_fence *f;
434 int ret = 0, i;
435
436 if (!exclusive) {
437 ret = reservation_object_reserve_shared(resv);
438
439 if (ret)
440 return ret;
441 }
442
443 fobj = reservation_object_get_list(resv);
444 fence = reservation_object_get_excl(resv);
445
446 if (fence && (!exclusive || !fobj || !fobj->shared_count)) {
447 struct nouveau_channel *prev = NULL;
448 bool must_wait = true;
449
450 f = nouveau_local_fence(fence, chan->drm);
451 if (f) {
452 rcu_read_lock();
453 prev = rcu_dereference(f->channel);
454 if (prev && (prev == chan || fctx->sync(f, prev, chan) == 0))
455 must_wait = false;
456 rcu_read_unlock();
457 }
458
459 if (must_wait)
460 ret = fence_wait(fence, intr);
461
462 return ret;
463 }
464
465 if (!exclusive || !fobj)
466 return ret;
467
468 for (i = 0; i < fobj->shared_count && !ret; ++i) {
469 struct nouveau_channel *prev = NULL;
470 bool must_wait = true;
471
472 fence = rcu_dereference_protected(fobj->shared[i],
473 reservation_object_held(resv));
474
475 f = nouveau_local_fence(fence, chan->drm);
476 if (f) {
477 rcu_read_lock();
478 prev = rcu_dereference(f->channel);
479 if (prev && (prev == chan || fctx->sync(f, prev, chan) == 0))
480 must_wait = false;
481 rcu_read_unlock();
482 }
483
484 if (must_wait)
485 ret = fence_wait(fence, intr);
486 }
487
488 return ret;
489}
490
491void
492nouveau_fence_unref(struct nouveau_fence **pfence)
493{
494 if (*pfence)
495 fence_put(&(*pfence)->base);
496 *pfence = NULL;
497}
498
499int
500nouveau_fence_new(struct nouveau_channel *chan, bool sysmem,
501 struct nouveau_fence **pfence)
502{
503 struct nouveau_fence *fence;
504 int ret = 0;
505
506 if (unlikely(!chan->fence))
507 return -ENODEV;
508
509 fence = kzalloc(sizeof(*fence), GFP_KERNEL);
510 if (!fence)
511 return -ENOMEM;
512
513 fence->sysmem = sysmem;
514
515 ret = nouveau_fence_emit(fence, chan);
516 if (ret)
517 nouveau_fence_unref(&fence);
518
519 *pfence = fence;
520 return ret;
521}
522
523static const char *nouveau_fence_get_get_driver_name(struct fence *fence)
524{
525 return "nouveau";
526}
527
528static const char *nouveau_fence_get_timeline_name(struct fence *f)
529{
530 struct nouveau_fence *fence = from_fence(f);
531 struct nouveau_fence_chan *fctx = nouveau_fctx(fence);
532
533 return !fctx->dead ? fctx->name : "dead channel";
534}
535
536/*
537 * In an ideal world, read would not assume the channel context is still alive.
538 * This function may be called from another device, running into free memory as a
539 * result. The drm node should still be there, so we can derive the index from
540 * the fence context.
541 */
542static bool nouveau_fence_is_signaled(struct fence *f)
543{
544 struct nouveau_fence *fence = from_fence(f);
545 struct nouveau_fence_chan *fctx = nouveau_fctx(fence);
546 struct nouveau_channel *chan;
547 bool ret = false;
548
549 rcu_read_lock();
550 chan = rcu_dereference(fence->channel);
551 if (chan)
552 ret = (int)(fctx->read(chan) - fence->base.seqno) >= 0;
553 rcu_read_unlock();
554
555 return ret;
556}
557
558static bool nouveau_fence_no_signaling(struct fence *f)
559{
560 struct nouveau_fence *fence = from_fence(f);
561
562 /*
563 * caller should have a reference on the fence,
564 * else fence could get freed here
565 */
566 WARN_ON(!kref_referenced_p(&fence->base.refcount));
567 WARN_ON(kref_exclusive_p(&fence->base.refcount));
568
569 /*
570 * This needs uevents to work correctly, but fence_add_callback relies on
571 * being able to enable signaling. It will still get signaled eventually,
572 * just not right away.
573 */
574 if (nouveau_fence_is_signaled(f)) {
575 list_del(&fence->head);
576
577 fence_put(&fence->base);
578 return false;
579 }
580
581 return true;
582}
583
584static void nouveau_fence_release(struct fence *f)
585{
586 struct nouveau_fence *fence = from_fence(f);
587 struct nouveau_fence_chan *fctx = nouveau_fctx(fence);
588
589 kref_put(&fctx->fence_ref, nouveau_fence_context_put);
590 fence_free(&fence->base);
591}
592
593static const struct fence_ops nouveau_fence_ops_legacy = {
594 .get_driver_name = nouveau_fence_get_get_driver_name,
595 .get_timeline_name = nouveau_fence_get_timeline_name,
596 .enable_signaling = nouveau_fence_no_signaling,
597 .signaled = nouveau_fence_is_signaled,
598 .wait = nouveau_fence_wait_legacy,
599 .release = nouveau_fence_release
600};
601
602static bool nouveau_fence_enable_signaling(struct fence *f)
603{
604 struct nouveau_fence *fence = from_fence(f);
605 struct nouveau_fence_chan *fctx = nouveau_fctx(fence);
606 bool ret;
607
608 if (!fctx->notify_ref++)
609 nvif_notify_get(&fctx->notify);
610
611 ret = nouveau_fence_no_signaling(f);
612 if (ret)
613 set_bit(FENCE_FLAG_USER_BITS, &fence->base.flags);
614 else if (!--fctx->notify_ref)
615 nvif_notify_put(&fctx->notify);
616
617 return ret;
618}
619
620static const struct fence_ops nouveau_fence_ops_uevent = {
621 .get_driver_name = nouveau_fence_get_get_driver_name,
622 .get_timeline_name = nouveau_fence_get_timeline_name,
623 .enable_signaling = nouveau_fence_enable_signaling,
624 .signaled = nouveau_fence_is_signaled,
625 .wait = fence_default_wait,
626 .release = NULL
627};
